attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Worst app I have ever used. Took an extended amount of time to download. Once the app downloaded to my phone, the app was full of this flaming hot Cheeto man and it was disgusting. No one should ever use this app.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: This app took forever to download, and when it did it wouldn’t let me in the app. And I took away all right for people. Was was so rude to me 🥴you should not get this app no matter what 😭🤦🏻‍♀️🧚

attributes.title: TERRIBLE !

attributes.title: Totally just didn’t mean to give the app a 1 star review 😳🤭

attributes.title: Don’t install
